message: According to pubstandards.co.uk, that's 17th March. Which is the day after a lot of people get back from SXSW. So, remember to delay any hippie detox shit until the 18th.
Pub Standards London Chapter event: http://upcoming.yahoo.com/event/7887941

I've put this on my calendar, hopefully I can make it. I'm from NJ, grew up in Bath UK, did my degree in London, working at Zynga here in SF since September - so I guess I fit the London/tech part, right?
Oh and I drink beer fast.
Cartz (@cartdawg on the twitters if you've heard of it) is coming too! She likes ale shandies.
Gonna miss it this week, been on a detox.
Today has been thirsty, thirsty work.
See you soon, thirsty compatriots. We'll be the ones not wearing green.
I'm here! Live blogging! I mean, chatting!
Ok, well I didn't recognize anyone (I only know leah IRL) but had an awesome time. What a great bar! Hopefully will meet everyone next time!

Hi Spencer! Sorry we missed you; we were right at the back on the sofas, but the place was pretty packed out later in the evening. We also disbanded a little early (11:30ish) due to SXSW exhaustion. I'm bemused but very pleased that you had a good first Pub Standards despite not finding us. Or perhaps because you didn't find us. One of those.

Ah - I thought that might have been you guys but didn't want to make an embarrassing approach in case it wasn't you! I was actually facing you guys at the booth nearest the seating at the back, with a couple friends. We left even earlier, around 10 as Cartz had some meetings this morning.
